extendedInfo.description: NEWS : Now the arabic version of Find Qibla Pro is available, please check Ø§ØªØ¬Ø§Ù Ø§ÙÙØ¨ÙØ©This application shows Qibla direction of your current location on a beautifully animated compass.To confirm the compass precision you can check the sun icon on the compass dial.You can use your device built-in GPS, cellular antennta location or select your desired city from more than 21000 cities round the world.Find Qibla also displays your heading to Qibla in degrees.

reviews.title: Good work.....
reviews.comment: Its very usefull........but need to improve graphics......any..way   thanks......app builders.....
reviews.author: Abdul Raheem

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It is working fine but some time it showing quibla in different direction. Please fix this. You guys are doing great job
reviews.author: Mohd Ruhullah

reviews.title: Its realy useful
reviews.comment: Gr8 job. May allah bles all behind this work
reviews.author: Akmal Akbar

reviews.title: good app
reviews.comment: Great app some time direction of qibla is not accurate.  kindly fix this issues.. its useful more in Ramazan...
reviews.author: Mohammed Ismail

reviews.title: Very Helpful
reviews.comment: Worked fine in my city so far, hope so in every city on earth. Compass\' Accuracy, Responsiveness, and Stability are good so far; hope their capabilities can be improved. Additional features as prayer time and/or Adzan can be nicely included. I do appreciate for this beautiful App. GBU, Thank you, Dev ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy S
reviews.comment: Awesome app MASHALLAH So i wil give 5 stars to this app
reviews.author: Salman Sheikh

reviews.title: Best winks finder on Android
reviews.comment: Simply the best and quickest qibla compass on Android. I\'ve tried many and all were inaccurate and way off, or very complicated to set. I\'m glad I found this.   Recommended to all and jazakumullah to the developers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why the ads
reviews.comment: Very nice and very accurate. But the ads are horrible and huge. I\'ll have to uninstall. But thanks 2 the developers.  May Allah reward you for it.
reviews.author: Khaled Saif

reviews.title: good app, but...
reviews.comment: running in background all the time. uninstalling it until im travelling again.  not a keeper.
reviews.author: Ct Didie

reviews.title: Not accurate
reviews.comment: I have tested in front of Kabbah but it shows wrong direction. Useless app
reviews.author: Syed Kashif Ali

reviews.comment: I find this app to be acurate most of the time, though sometimes you have wait for the calibration. I like it .Marshala
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent in all respects.
reviews.author: Umer Farooq

reviews.title: Recommended for travellers!
reviews.comment: Very useful app if you are travelling frequently. Jazakallah.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent! I used this in several places and it was perfect. What I like most about this is, it uses mobile network instead of WiFi
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NICE !
reviews.comment: Excellent, works in indonesia, especially center sulawesi
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Safia
reviews.comment: For me it is the best so far. It works properly and accurate. Thanks to the developers. Allah hafiz!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Completely inaccurate
reviews.comment: The direction given by the built-in GPS option is at least 90 degrees away from what is given by the \'select city\' option. Which one is correct? If I knew that beforehand I wouldn\'t be using the app in the first place. In short don\'t trust this app.
reviews.author: Shabber Hussain

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: good

reviews.comment: Excellent, it\'s really work. Thanks

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
